name: Hired!
description: you have been 'hired' in a mr beast chalange and are put in an alien office. you are given a laptop and a strange metal shelf with a $1000 check in it. a speacker tells you you have to donate to team seas as much as you can with that 1k and you can take as much time you need. you are told you can play minigames on the computer and to find out how to donate as much as possable. donate $20k, you win 20k. enjoy
